welcomeText: My name is Yves and I work as a fullstack webdeveloper since 2020. I have a Bachelor of Science ZFH in Computer Science from ZHAW School of Engineering. I'm a big fan of component frameworks like React and Vue and work fullstack preferably with NodeJS and Typescript.
